rules.text: Respect the laws which apply in Germany.
Discrimination (e.g. racism, sexism, ableism, etc.) has no place here.
Posts with politically extremist content are prohibited.
Please follow scientific standards when creating science content.
Content that users might find offensive should be marked as sensitive.
Job ads are welcome. Please use the Hashtag #NFDIjobs which can be searched and filtered for.
